com.riskgame.controller

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.controller.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    @Controller
public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is entry point of Map management related operation like edit map,create map, load map, validate map etc.
    Author:
    Zankhanaben Patel, Koshaben Patel
